DOC.brief_title: VectorFlow Tunneled Dialysis Catheter ( TDC ) Versus Palindrome TDC

DOC.criteria: End stage renal disease acute renal failure require hemodialysis tunnel dialysis catheter Age > 18 , Age < 80 Capable give informed consent Coagulopathy define international normalized ration ( INR ) > 2 correct fresh frozen plasma Platelet count < 50,000/microliter , correct platelet transfusion Active skin infection site TDC insertion Presence bacteremia infect AVG/AVF within 7 day prior enrollment Neutropenia define absolute neutrophil count le 1,700/microliter Known central venous stenosis Occlusion bilateral external internal jugular vein bilateral brachiocephalic vein stenosis superior vena cava Functioning surgical HD access ( ie AVG/AVF ) AVG/AVF expect functional within 90 day enrollment Inability provide inform consent Pregnant nursing woman In event physician feel either catheter would appropriate subject , subject eligible participate
